result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donte S Woodard

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Donte S Woodard appeared by video.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn appeared by video for Donte S Woodard.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense counsel has received discovery and offer and requests additional time to review. 
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 30.
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Justice Point Discharge Report, filed. Forwarded to Judge for review.
Pretrial Services Violation Report Received and Filed.

Court ordered no contact with Walgreens (Oakland Ave.)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Defendant Donte S Woodard appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Christin Marie Saint Pierre appeared by video for Donte S Woodard.  Attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. 
This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
